appDesc.message: Generate and copy Facebook Ad texts using ChatGPT.

noticeText.message: This extension helps generate ad copy. Copy the generated text and paste it into Facebook Ads Manager.

inputContentPlaceholder.message: Paste your landing page content, offer, or job description here...

aboutText.message: This Chrome extension helps you generate compelling ad copy for Facebook Ads using AI.

howToUseIntro.message: Here's how to use the extension:

howToUseStepInput.message: Input Content: Paste your product description, landing page text, or offer details into the "Input Content" area.

howToUseStepStyle.message: Copywriter Style & Form of Address: Select a famous copywriter's style (or default) and choose the form of address (Du/Sie).

howToUseStepGenerate.message: Generate: Click "Generate Ad Copy" to create Primary Text, Headline, and Description. The tool will attempt to generate 3 versions.

howToUseStepReviewV1.message: Review & Copy (Version 1): The first generated version is shown in the main "Ad Preview" boxes. Click the copy icon next to each field (Primary Text, Headline, Description) to copy that part of Version 1 to your clipboard.

howToUseStepReviewTabs.message: Review & Copy (All Versions - Tabs): Below the Version 1 preview, a tabbed section will appear.

howToUseStepReviewTabsSub2.message: Each tab shows all generated versions (e.g., Version 1, Version 2, Version 3) for that specific ad component.

howToUseStepReviewTabsSub3.message: Click the copy icon next to any version's text to copy it.

howToUseStepSaveV1.message: Save (V1): Click "Save (V1)" to store the current input, selections, and the first generated ad copy to the archive.

howToUseStepArchive.message: Archive: Click "Archive" to view, load (Version 1 only), or delete previously saved ad copies.

howToUseStepReset.message: Reset: Click "Reset" to clear the input and all preview fields (including tabs). Your text will be saved automatically otherwise.

settingsInfoText.message: You must configure your OpenAI API key and can select your preferred ChatGPT model in the settings. Click the gear icon (⚙️) in the header to access settings. GPT-4o is selected by default.

troubleshootingNoText.message: No text generated: Check if your API key is correctly entered and has credits. Also, ensure your internet connection is stable and the selected model is accessible with your key.

troubleshootingFormatting.message: Text formatting: The AI tries to use paragraphs and bullet points where appropriate. If the formatting isn't perfect, you may need to make minor adjustments after pasting.

systemPromptInfoText.message: The following prompt (reflecting your current selections for copywriter and address form) is used to instruct the AI:

emptyArchiveMessageText.message: Your archive is empty. Save an ad to see it here.

archiveDeleteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this archived item?

apiKeyNotSetAlert.message: OpenAI API Key is not set. Please configure it in settings. (Click the ⚙️ icon)

noValidContentToCopyAlert.message: No valid content to copy for $1.

tabGenerateAdCopyMessage.message: Generate ad copy to see versions here.
